author: xxvvv
notes:
Used fishes/aliens to get to legend 3. Had to run 3 chalice in my fishes and aliens decks just for the annoying sylvans. Then I lost my patience and switched to sylvans myself.
I feel like 3 S/Ts are enough. 5 is too much for me. Milling S/Ts is a huge waste. The skill is restart. I usually use restart to search for a S/T. All the three S/Ts can send carrot/rose to GY, which is super useful.
